reviews.title: What Our Customers Say
reviews.description: Enjoy the experiences of our customers from their trips
reviews.review1: Excellent experience! The boat was excellently maintained and the captain was very professional. We had a wonderful time in the Saronic Gulf. We will definitely do it again!
reviews.review2: Absolute success! The rental was very easy and the boat was excellent. We visited many islands and had a wonderful time. Very polite and professional!
reviews.review3: Our family experience was fantastic! The kids loved it and we fully relaxed. The staff was very helpful and the boat excellently maintained. We highly recommend!

cta.title: Ready for a unique experience?
cta.description: Contact us now to book your trip

meta.siteDescription: RIB boat rental for tours in the Saronic Gulf and the coasts of Athens. Safe and comfortable trips with professional service.

rent.title: Boat Rental
rent.short: Rentals with or without crew. Flexible hours.
rent.description: Rent one of our boats for your excursions. With or without crew, flexible hours and full safety equipment.

cruises.title: Cruises
cruises.short: Day cruises to the most beautiful beaches.
cruises.description: Enjoy organized cruises to the most beautiful beaches of the Saronic Gulf. Relax, swim and discover hidden coves.

transfers.title: Transfers
transfers.short: Transfers from Lagonisi to neighboring islands.
transfers.description: Fast and comfortable transfers from Lagonisi to the neighboring islands of the Saronic Gulf. Ideal for day trips.

lobster23.shortDescription: Comfortable and fast boat – ideal for day trips and cruises.
lobster23.longDescription: The Lobster 23 offers comfort for up to 9 passengers, with a powerful 150 HP engine and space for sunbathing. Ideal for classic escapes to the Saronic Gulf.

ribco27.shortDescription: Powerful and fast boat — ideal for large groups and long excursions.
ribco27.longDescription: The Ribco 27 is an impressive boat with a 250 HP engine and capacity for 8 people. Ideal for exceptional trips and fast transfers.

olympic490.shortDescription: Compact motorboat — ideal for day trips and fast cruising.
olympic490.longDescription: The Olympic 490 is a comfortable and reliable boat with a 34 HP engine. Ideal for trips up to 5 people, with comfortable cruising and economical fuel consumption.

athenaiki-riviera.shortDescription: The beautiful coast of Athens with stunning beaches and luxurious resorts.
athenaiki-riviera.longDescription: The Athenian Riviera stretches from Faliro to Sounio, offering a unique experience with stunning beaches, clear water and excellent facilities. It is the ideal destination for those who want to combine access to the city with the enjoyment of the sea. The beaches of the Riviera are known for their sandy shores, clear water and luxurious facilities they offer.
tips: Best time to visit: May - September
It is recommended to reserve a spot at a beach bar early in the morning
Combined visit to the Temple of Poseidon at Sounio is available
Surfing and other water sports available
Many options for food and drinks with sea view

aigina.shortDescription: The closest island of the Saronic Gulf with rich history and beautiful beaches.
aigina.longDescription: Aegina is the closest island of the Saronic Gulf, making it an ideal destination for day trips. The island combines rich ancient monuments, such as the ancient Temple of Aphaia, with beautiful beaches and traditional villages. The capital of the island, Aegina, is known for its neoclassical buildings and traditional market, where you can find fresh almonds and Aegina pistachios.
highlights: Historic Temple of Aphaia (5th century BC)
Easy access - just 1 hour from Lagonisi
tips: Visit the Temple of Aphaia for fantastic views
Try the fresh almonds and Aegina pistachios
Recommended beaches: Agia Marina, Marathonas, Souvala
Best time: April - October
Combine with a visit to the archaeological museum

poros.shortDescription: Colorful island with lush vegetation, ideal for relaxation and swimming.
poros.longDescription: Poros is a small but very beautiful island consisting of two islets, Sphairia and Kalavria, connected by a small bridge. The island is known for its lush vegetation, beautiful seaside villages and quiet beaches. The capital, also Poros, is built amphitheatrically on the hill and offers fantastic views towards the Peloponnese. The island is ideal for those seeking tranquility and relaxation.
tips: Visit the Monastery of Zoodochos Pigi for the view
Recommended beaches: Love Bay, Russian Shipyard
Ideal for dining at seaside taverns
Best time: May - September
You can combine with a visit to Troezen

ydra.shortDescription: The most charming island of the Saronic Gulf with unique architecture and no cars allowed.
ydra.longDescription: Hydra is one of the most famous and charming islands of the Saronic Gulf, known for the ban on cars and its traditional stone houses. The island has a rich naval history and was an important trading center during the Revolution. The capital, also Hydra, is one of the most photographed villages in Greece, with the stone houses forming an amphitheatrical amphitheater around the port. The island is a popular destination for artists and celebrities.
highlights: Cars banned - only donkeys and bicycles
Beautiful beaches accessible only by boat
tips: Visit the museums and art galleries
Recommended beaches: Mandra, Vlychos, Agia Eirini
Try the local sweets and fish
Best time: April - October
Ideal for photos and walks

tzia.shortDescription: The closest Cycladic island with unique landscape and archaeological sites.
tzia.longDescription: Tzia (or Kea) is the closest island of the Cyclades, but technically belongs to the Saronic. The island combines Cycladic landscape with lush vegetation and is known for its archaeological sites, such as the ancient Kouros statue found here. The capital Ioulida is built amphitheatrically and offers fantastic views. The island has beautiful beaches, many hiking trails and rich marine life.
highlights: Archaeological museum with the Kea Kouros
Rich marine life - ideal for snorkeling
tips: Visit the archaeological museum in Ioulida
Recommended beaches: Otzias, Koundouros, Frea
Ideal for snorkeling and water sports
Best time: May - September
Combine with hiking on the island's trails

kythnos.shortDescription: Discoverable island with hot springs, traditional villages and quiet beaches.
kythnos.longDescription: Kythnos is one of the least known islands of the Saronic, offering an authentic Greek experience. The island is known for its hot springs, located in the Loutra area, and for its traditional villages, Chora and Merichas. Kythnos has many beautiful beaches, some of which are accessible only by boat. The island is ideal for those seeking tranquility and natural beauty.
tips: Visit the hot springs in Loutra
Recommended beaches: Kolona, Apo Kanalia, Martinthia
Try the local products and fish
Best time: May - September
Ideal for photos and exploration

makronisos.shortDescription: Small uninhabited island with beautiful beaches and historical significance.
makronisos.longDescription: Makronisos is a small uninhabited island located near Tzia (Kea). The island has historical significance as it was used as a place of exile during the Civil War. Today, Makronisos offers beautiful beaches with clear water that are accessible only by boat. The island is ideal for those seeking absolute tranquility and isolation, with wild nature and stunning seas.
highlights: Beautiful beaches accessible only by boat
Clear water and ideal for swimming
tips: Best time to visit: May - September
Bring food and drinks with you as there are no facilities
Ideal for snorkeling and swimming
Watch the weather - the island may be inaccessible in bad weather
Recommended visit with a captain who knows the area

patroklos.shortDescription: Small island near Sounio with beautiful beaches and stunning views.
patroklos.longDescription: Patroklos (or Patroklio) is a small uninhabited island located near Sounio, on the Athenian Riviera. The island is known for its beautiful beaches, dark blue water and stunning views towards the Temple of Poseidon. Patroklos offers absolute tranquility and is ideal for swimming, snorkeling and sunbathing. The island is accessible only by boat and is one of the most beautiful hidden destinations of the Athenian Riviera.
highlights: Stunning views towards the Temple of Poseidon
Beautiful beaches with dark blue water
tips: Best time to visit: May - October
Combine with a visit to Sounio and the Temple of Poseidon
Bring snorkeling gear and swimming equipment
Ideal for photos with the Temple in the background
Watch the wind - the island may be inaccessible with strong winds

agkistri.shortDescription: Green island with pine forests, beautiful beaches and traditional villages.
agkistri.longDescription: Agkistri is a small green island in the Saronic Gulf, known for its pine forests and beautiful beaches. The island has two main villages, Megali Chora and Skala, and offers an ideal escape with a combination of nature, sea and traditional Greek atmosphere. Agkistri has many beautiful beaches, from sandy to rocky, and is ideal for those seeking a quiet and natural experience.
highlights: Traditional villages Megali Chora and Skala
Variety of beaches - sandy and rocky
tips: Best time to visit: April - October
Visit Megali Chora for traditional atmosphere
Recommended beaches: Skala, Chaloyita, Dragonera
Try the local fish at seaside taverns
Ideal for walks in the pine forest

structuredData.businessDescription: RIB boat rental in Athens for tours in the Saronic Gulf and the coasts of Athens
structuredData.service1Description: RIB boat rental for tours in the Saronic Gulf. We offer a variety of sizes and capacities for every need.
structuredData.service2Description: Organized cruises to beautiful places in the Saronic Gulf. Discover hidden coves and beaches that are only accessible by sea.
structuredData.service3Description: Transfers to islands and beaches of the Saronic Gulf. Fast and safe transportation with our boats.
structuredData.reviewBody: Excellent experience! The boat was clean, the captain very professional and the route wonderful.

cookieBanner.title: We Use Cookies
cookieBanner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. By continuing to browse, you accept the use of cookies.
